item.name: Commands to Braces
item.appendix: Commands, when pressed alone, type braces. When used with other keys they're normal commands.
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
